title: Lossy Compression Coding and Reinforcement Learning-Based Optimization Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of computer architecture and data representation concepts
context.additional_context: Educational program to enhance language data compression technology competencies for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. Designed around real-time processing application cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of zero-latency compression coding in Markov source models.
Learners can implement compression policies using reinforcement learning-based Q-learning algorithms.
Learners can design and evaluate near-optimal compression strategies on real-world language data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
